metadata.Title: CVE-2017-12102 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An exploitable integer overflow exists in the way that the Blender open-source 3d creation suite v2.78c converts curves to polygons. A specially crafted .blend file can cause an integer overflow resulting in a buffer overflow which can allow for code execution under the context of the application. An attacker can convince a user to open the file or use the file as a library in order to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: blender package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
